long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the ABC Chrome Extension today to manage your proxies and access preferred websites with a simple one-click connection.

WHAT is ABC Proxy ?

ABC Proxy is Top Residential IP proxy provider, with more than 200M+ IP addresses, covering more than 190 countries, professional and customizable HTTP(s)/Socks5 proxy. Residential proxy network consists of real IP addresses from real users, making sure you never get detected or blocked. There’s no sharing of any kind, so your proxy is available only to you. Residential proxy sufficient IP session duration . IP Survival time <=24h and enjoy 99.9% uptime and a continuously growing global IP pool.

WHAT is ABC Chrome Extension?

ABC Chrome Extension is a free proxy app that allows you to add, edit and manage proxies from any proxy provider. With a simple one-click connection, you can switch between different proxies to manage multiple social media accounts or access websites that would otherwise be blocked.

Why use the ABC Chrome Extension?

✔ Super easy to use
Proxy List Select the appropriate country to extract directly and click on the link, or add a custom proxy and switch between multiple IPs with a simple one-click connection - all basic proxy session features are available.

✔ Top residential proxy provider
More than 200M+ IP addresses, covering more than 190 countries, professional and customizable HTTP(s)/Socks5 proxy.

- No need to go Incognito-mode or clear your cache -
 
Chrome is notorious for caching all kinds of request headers. We managed to work around this and ensure that session control with ID change via username string works as expected. 

How to start using ABC Chrome Extension?

* Add and switch between multiple proxies
* Simple, one-click connection 
* Use any proxy provider and stick to using only one extension 
* Lock your IP address to maintain the same session to avoid IP blocks 
* Easily switch between any proxy type or HTTP(S) and SOCKS protocols

That's it! You can now browse the internet without hiding your actual location.

Don't have a proxy provider yet?

Try ABC Proxy's premium proxy service offerings:

- The highest performing residential proxy on the market;
- 200M+ residential proxy IP pool, providing human-like crawling without IP blocks;
- Static Residential Proxy provides comprehensive capabilities of data center and residential IP;
- The largest and most stable mobile agent IP pool;
- Unlimited number of concurrent sessions for IPv4 proxy;
- SOCKS5 proxies are best for traffic-intensive scraping over UDP connections;
- and more.

P.S. If you have a feature request for the ABC Chrome Extension or want to report a bug, please contact us at support@ABC Proxy.com.
